about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of Roots of Pacha. Composed by Santi Baravalle with sound design by David Ames. This mix weaves ambient sound with the music to give a more Pachan experience.

Features
  • 63 curated songs lasting over 190 minutes.
  • Contains music from the Main Menu, Character Creation, all regions, all seasons and most cutscenes.
  • Available in MP3 or 48khz WAV format.
